channel.title: Dice game/clan
channel.description: Hey, anyone wana make some money in rs?? Join clan *pmmeforclan* for a dice clan, If you want to host you must be ranked. You can only be ranked if giving 5m to the clan owner. If something goes wrong ( one of the hosts leaves before he gives money ) I will give the lost money. Thanks, No1

item.title: Dice game/clan
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

We don’t allow selling staff spots in servers, we aren’t going to allow it for clans either.

Read full topic

Hey, anyone wana make some money in rs??
Join clan pmmeforclan for a dice clan, If you want to host you must be ranked.
You can only be ranked if giving 5m to the clan owner.
If something goes wrong ( one of the hosts leaves before he gives money ) I will give the lost money.
